texts.en:
Regina is 49 years old. She's single and has two adult children who are independent. She also supports her mother and her nephew.
She's an agricultural worker for a banana company.
The current loan will be used to purchase construction supplies (rocks, cement, windows and beams) and to pay for labor and transportation in order to continue building her house.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (rocks, cement, windows and beams) and to pay for labor and transportation in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase another dairy cow

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
Marta vive maritalmente há 25 anos, tem 43 anos de idade e é comerciante. Tem três filhos que estão a estudar e sustenta também 7 filhos de outra mulher do seu esposo que vivem com ela.
Com o valor do empréstimo, Marta pretende comprar óleo, cebola, caldos, farinha e arroz para reforçar o seu negócio, que é feito na sua casa.
Diz que gostaria de ver seu negocio crescer, ter um estabelecimento (pois agora vende numa banca) e que quer construir uma casa num espaço que lhe foi atribuído na mesma zona para seus filhos.
Diz estar certa de conseguir realizar tudo o que planeou para isso irá pagar nas data acordadas e voltar a solicitar mais crédito.
texts.en:
Marta has been married for 25 years. She's 43 years old and a merchant. She has three children who go to school. Also, she supports seven children of another wife of her husband's, who live with her.
With the amount of the loan Marta intends to purchase cooking oil, onions, broths, flour and rice in order to boost her business, which she runs from home.
She states that she would like to see her business grow and to own a store (because she currently sells from a stall). She also wishes to build a house in a space that has been allotted to her children in the same area.
She states that she's certain she will accomplish everything she has planned. For that purpose she'll make the repayments on the scheduled dates and request more loans again.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, onions, broths, flour and rice for selling.

loans.name: Adélia

texts.pt:
Adélia tem 36 anos de idade, vive maritalmente e é mãe de 2 filhos com idade escolar.
Adélia é negociante com uma longa experiência e tem um estabelecimento comercial especializado em venda de produtos tipo mercearia. Tem também a ajuda do seu marido que é mecânico.
Com o empréstimo, a Adélia pretende comprar produtos de primeira necessidade como Massas, Arroz, farinha, Óleos, sabão, ovos, manteiga e diversas bebidas.
Adélia sonha um dia beneficiar-se de mais empréstimos. Já tem carro e casa própria que conseguiu construir graças ao seu negocio e diz que felizmente neste momento não tem nenhuma dificuldade.
texts.en:
Adélia is 36 years old and married. She has two school-age children.
Adélia is a greatly experienced merchant and owns a store which specializes in selling goods such as groceries. She also gets help from her husband, who's a mechanic.
With the loan Adélia intends to purchase products that are household staples, such as noodles, rice, flour, cooking oil, soap, eggs, butter and various beverages.
Adélia dreams of someday obtaining more loans. She already has a car and a house that she owns and has succeeded in building thanks to her business. She states that, fortunately, she doesn't face any hardships at the moment.

loans.use: to purchase products that are household staples, such as noodles, rice, flour, cooking oil, soap, eggs, butter and various beverages, for re-selling in her grocery store.

loans.name: Angin

texts.en:
Angin lives with her husband, son and daughter in Nor Ughi village of the Ararat region. She has been involved in agriculture for 10 years and over these years of hard work now runs a small but successful farm. She keeps chickens and cultivates different types of fruit and vegetables (tomato, peach, apricot and apple).
Angin's husband doesn't work and the only source of income for the family is agriculture. The income they get is hardly enough to cover basic costs and it is very difficult for Angin to save money for the farm. So she has requested this loan to purchase fertilizer and to cover cultivation costs. 
The loan is very important both for Angin and for her husband to enlarge their farm and be able to ensure a better life for their school-age children.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and cover cultivation costs

location.town: Nor Ughi village of Ararat region

loans.name: Tambuu

texts.en:
Tambuu is a married mother of six children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past two years, she has operated a business selling clothes, selling at the market to her neighbours and passers-by. She faces a major challenge of stiff competition in her business. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of 20,000 KES, she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph lives in the Kisii area of Kenya, which is scarce of available land. He has six children and has been farming for 18 years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, crops, and personal business.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: "It's a source of income for my household needs." His biggest challenge is lack of market, poor roads, and drought. One of the animals on his farm has been given the name Nyang'era.

Joseph chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because it meets his financial needs. When he was asked what he learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session, he said "It's customer friendly, and rates are low."

His highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked how this loan will benefit his family, Joseph said that it will be a source of capital to improve their living standard.

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Joseph owns the following: a cow, poultry, and a motorcycle. He does not own a pig, a pump, a bicycle, or an automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. Joseph has in his household a mosquito net, solar power, a TV, and a DVD player, but he does not have electricity, running water, or a sewing machine.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Pola

texts.en:
Pola is married and has three children, all of whom attend school and are under her care. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For over two years, Pola has operated a clothes selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. In addition, she also sells green grocery items, which is her other source of income. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase one bale of clothes, a sack of green vegetables, and tomatoes. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase one bale of clothes, a sack of green vegetables, and tomatoes.

loans.name: Dhahabu

texts.en:
Dhahabu is married and has four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family and fees for her children.

For the past two years, she has operated a business selling coconuts, selling as wholesale to local neighbours. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation in the business. She dreams of establishing a vegetable stall in the future.

With the 10,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is married and has six children who attend school. She owns a house that has no electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and fees.

Saumu has operated a charcoal-selling business for the past two years. She sells from home to her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation in her business. She dreams of incorporating firewood into her existing business in the near future.

With the loan she is requesting, she plans to purchase four sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support.

loans.use: to purchase four sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Chidodo

texts.en:
Chidodo is a married mother of seven children, all of whom graduated from school. They live at their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For years, Chidodo has operated a food stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of establishing a hotel in the future. 

With the KES 30,000, she wants to purchase three bundles of wheat flour, cooking oil and charcoal. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase three bundles of wheat flour, cooking oil and charcoal.

loans.name: Mupa

texts.en:
Mupa is married and has 5 children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For over 2 years, she has operated a clothes-selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase 4 bales of clothes for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase 4 bales of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Dario

texts.en:
Dario is an artisan in Peru who specializes in handcrafted jewelry. He would like to purchase larger quantities of silver to increase production.

Dario has been selling through NOVICA since 2006. This is his story:

"I began helping out in a jewelry workshop when I was 15, during school vacations. Little by little, this activity became a passion. I realized how much I enjoyed working with meticulous details and eventually found a great deal of satisfaction in creating jewelry that people liked. Beauty can be expressed in different forms and manners. The challenge for a country like Peru is to get ahead little by little, despite the many difficult circumstances that exist. It's important that people appreciate the art of jewelry, as many don't value the effort it requires."

"We all need a helping hand once in a while, and it is nice to know we can always count on a friendly hand. Thank you so much for your support through this microcredit - please receive a big hug across the miles!"

Use the link below to view Dario's silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/5621

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities of silver to increase production.

loans.name: Adjorman's Group

texts.en:
Eunice is a hardworking woman. This is the first time she is participating in the ID-Ghana microfinance program. In the first loan cycle, she wants to borrow GHS 400 to buy more vegetables (cabbage, carrots, cucumbers and beans) to expand her business. She wants to gain earnings and save the profit to grow her children up well.

Other members who are part of the Adjorman Group include the following:

Millicent is 60 years old and married. She sells clothing. She wants to borrow GHS 500 to invest in her business.

Mary is 54 years old and is married with children. She sells medicine. She wants to borrow GHS 700 to invest in her business.

Vivian is 57 years old and is married with children. She sells clothing materials. She wants to borrow GHS 1,000 to invest in her business.

Rosena is 30 years old, and she has children. She sells fruits. She wants to borrow GHS 800 to invest in her business.

Susana is 43 years old and is married with children. She sells foodstuffs and cooking oil. She wants to borrow GHS 800 to invest in her business.

Sarah is 48 years old and has one child. She sells eggs. She wants to borrow GHS 600 to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables (cabbage, carrots, cucumbers and beans) to expand her business.

loans.name: Komang Agus

texts.en: Komang Agus is a Balinese artisan who crafts jewelry by hand using bone and coconut shell. He would like to invest in a purchase of the raw materials he needs to increase his stock and create new designs. Komang Agus has been selling through NOVICA since 2011. This is his story: "The place where I was born is renowned for its alternative jewelry tradition. That is, jewelry crafted with bone, horn, woods, and beads. Growing up here, my creativity and my imagination simply took off. My father is a great wood carver. He taught me a lot and was very patient with me. Now I use those techniques to carve different materials such as bone and horn, too." "I am so glad to receive your trust by way of this microcredit. My plan is to use it toward increasing my stock and crafting new designs that will please my customers. Thank you for this great opportunity!" Use the link below to view Komang Agus's handcrafted jewelry on the NOVICA site: www.novica.com/kiva/8254

loans.use: to invest in a purchase of raw materials for his jewelry.

loans.name: Fermin

texts.en:
Fermin is a Peruvian artisan who specializes in handcrafted jewelry. He would like to invest in the purchase of silver to increase production.

Fermin has been selling through NOVICA since 2005. This is his story:

"After school, I'd rush to my father's workshop to practice creating my own designs. Jewelry has been all I ever wanted to do, so I saw no point in going to university. I was able to dedicate more time to the workshop when I graduated from high school. We were able to attract more customers then, and the family's business began to increase steadily. My designs are inspired by everything I see around me, and by our ancestors' jewelry."

"I would like to express my gratitude for your support through this microcredit. It will allow me to purchase the silver I need to craft more jewelry to build up my stock, and so increase my sales."

Use the link below to view Fermin's silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/5095

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of silver to increase production

loans.name: Angel

texts.en:
Angel is a Peruvian artisan who specializes in masks and accent pieces inspired by Inca art. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of bronze and copper to increase production.

Angel has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is his story:

"This art means a lot in my life; it is how I support my family and is also my passion," confides Angel. "My art is a way of capturing all my efforts and dedication toward my family. What motivates me is that I want to learn more about my ancestors and our cultural legacy. What I want to transmit is everything that ancient Peruvian cultures left for the world. I want everyone to know these great artisans and their creations."

"Rarely have I ever felt so supported and encouraged like I do now, which is why I'd like to thank you from the bottom of my heart for this microcredit. I send you a big hug all the way from Peru."

Use the link below to view Angel's bronze and copper Inca art on the NOVICA site:

http://www.novica.com/kiva/7664

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of bronze and copper for his metalwork

loans.name: María Concepcion

texts.es:
La Señora. María se encuentra realizando su cuarto crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Fe y Alegría, le gusta esta forma de créditos porque son rápidos y comparte con sus amigas. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca lugar que goza de mucha belleza por la arquitectura, esta bañada por 4 ríos quienes la cobijan, esta ciudad es cuna de escritores y artesanos, su gastronómica cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

La Señora. María tiene 46 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 23 y 17 años, su primer hijo trabaja y su segundo hijo estudia en el colegio. Su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que vive  propia.

Doña María desde hace 3 meses se dedica a limpiar casas, trabajo que por el momento le va bien, en su casa se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su  casa y para la venta, también cría pollos, gallinas de postura y cuyes. 

Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes, semillas y abono para sus cultivos. 

Su meta es arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
María is taking out her fourth loan at her friends' side from the Fe y Alegría communal bank. She likes this type of loan because they are quick and she shares with her friends. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a place that has a lot of beauty in its architecture. It is bathed in 4 rivers that shelter it. This city is the cradle of writers and artisans. It's cuisine captivates the palates of its own people and visitors alike. 

María is 46 years old. She is married and from her marriage has 2 children, aged 23 and 17. Her oldest son works and her second son is in high school. Her husband works as a bricklayer. They own the house they live in. 

For 3 months, María has worked cleaning houses. Right now, the work is going well for her. In her house she grows vegetables and harvests them for her household consumption and to sell. She also raises egg-laying chickens and guinea pigs.  

She is going to invest her loan in buying chickens, guinea pigs, seeds and fertilizer for her crops. 

Her goal is to fix her house.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Jocelyn S.

texts.en:
Jocelyn S. is 35 years old, married, and has four children, three of whom are in school.

Jocelyn S. is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Jocelyn S. would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Altantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Altantsetseg, 43 years old, lives with her husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a brick house on a plot of land. She has been doing house interior decoration for almost ten years, and usually works on contract with building entities. Her husband has a profession of field engineer and currently works at a mining company. Her son is enlisted in the military service. 

Recently Altantsetseg has begun making an extension to her house by adding one story. But due to lack of finances, she and her husband haven't finished building the second story. So she is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT to purchase vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, shingles for roofing, and insulation materials. 

As her son became a grown up man and is soon getting married is the main reason for making an extension, and it is also cheaper than building a new house. Moreover, the extension shall reduce overall heat loss and will provide extra protection against frosts and storms because the previous roof was so fragile. 

After making the extension, the family will live in a comfortable and warm place where they will burn less coal for heating, releasing less pollutants into the air, and contributing to the efforts against air pollution. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who wants to see her grandchild as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase vacuum windows, hardwood floors, shingles, and insulation materials.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 22-year-old single man from a small village near Tulkarem city.

He is a hard worker, but his income is low because his ability to go to work every day is inhibited by the checkpoint between his city and where he works. His income is unstable and he often faces daily challenges in his effort to make a living.

Ibrahim would like to improve his living conditions and complete building his new home so he took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help Ibrahim to pay the costs of buying construction materials like cement and iron.

loans.use: to pay the costs of buying construction materials like cement and iron.

loans.name: Jocelyn T.

texts.en:
Jocelyn T. is 29 years old and married with two children.

Jocelyn T. works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns additional income from fish vending.

She requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like canned goods, snack foods, milk, eggs, detergent, soap, etc. to sell in her general store. She has borrowed and paid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Jocelyn T. aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, snack foods, milk, eggs, detergent, soap, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Rosa Maribel

texts.es:
Rosa, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo para surtir mas en el negocio; este le permitirá comprar más pescado rojo y blanco, frutas y verduras. 
El efecto del crédito anterior fue favorable,  ya que logro mejorar su negocio con más productos  y agregar otro tipo de productos; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado.
texts.en:
Rosa is in need of asking for a new loan because she requires more working capital to stock her business more. This will allow her to buy more redfish and white fish as well as fruit and vegetables. 

The effect of the previous loan was favorable, because she was able to improve her business with more products and add other types of products. Her financial and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy more redfish and whitefish, as well as fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.en:
From Talibon, Bohol, Hipolito is a 52-year-old married man with a five-year-old son. For more than ten years he has farmed seaweed for a living.

Hipolito is applying for a loan of 7,000 PHP through CEVI to buy straw, rope and more seaweed seedlings so as to increase his harvest and augment his income. In the future Hipolito would like to expand his seaweed farming business to improve his family's standard of living as well as to save for his son’s education.

loans.use: to buy straw, rope and more seaweed seedlings

loans.name: Ramena

texts.en:
From Talibon, Bohol, Ramena is a 22-year-old married woman with an eleven-month-old son. For almost three years now she and her husband have worked hard farming seaweed. In this way they support their family's daily needs.

In order to sustain their seaweed farming, Ramena is applying for a loan of 5,000 PHP through CEVI to buy rope and additional seaweed seedlings. With these purchases they hope to increase their harvest as well as their sales.

In the future Ramena would like to expand her seaweed farming so as to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy rope and additional seaweed seedlings

loans.name: María Petronila

texts.es:
María tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y ha procreado cuatro hijos. Ella siempre se ha encargado de realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa; primero con sus padres y hoy en su propio hogar. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundacion Campo, es para comprar cuatro sacos de abono y si le sobra lo utilizara para compra otros insumos. Con el préstamo, podrá comprar la cantidad de insumos que necesita la milpa para que de una buena cosecha.


Su vida mejorará mucho ya que la cliente cree que van a obtener una mejor cosecha, y al vender el maíz podrán comprar cosas necesarias en el hogar o familia como zapatos ropa y algunos muebles que necesitan.


Su próximo proyecto, es construir una pila para almacenar agua; ya que solo tiene un barril donde donde guarda agua y cuando no cae le toca ir lejos a conseguir.
texts.en:
María is 35 years old. She is married and has four children. She has always taken care of the housework, first with her parents and now in her own home.

The loan she is asking for from Fundacion Campo is to buy four bags of fertilizer, and if there is any left, to buy other materials. With the loan, she will be able to buy the quantity of materials the corn needs to have a good harvest. 


Her life will improve a lot since she thinks she will have a better harvest, and when she sells the corn they will be able to buy things they need for their home or family, like shoes, clothes and some furniture. 


Her next project is to build a tank to store water, since she only has a barrel where she keeps water, and when it doesn't rain she has to go far to get it.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of fertilizer and with what is left over buy other materials.

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna, 33, lives with her parents on an island on the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. Her parents are farmers. She has two daughters; one attends school and the other is at home. She stays home as well, doing the family’s housework.

As can be seen in the photo, Vanna is in the process of building the family a house. She is applying for a 1000 USD loan through MAXIMA to buy construction materials and pay for building fees.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay for building fees.

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en:
Sokhom, age 39, lives with her elderly father in a village along the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two daughters who are in school.   Sokhom has been weaving for twenty years (picture with her loom).  Her husband is a motor taxi driver.
Currently, the price of raw silk is about $110/ Kali. Kali is a measurement used in Cambodia for about 2.50 kg of raw silk.

loans.use: To buy silk materials for her silk weaving business.

loans.name: Koemlim

texts.en: Koemlim (in the photo) stays at home and does house work. She lives outside of Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia. She has two daughters. One is a garment worker and the other one is an accounting assistant for a factory.  The main source of income is from her daughters and husband’s salary. Her husband is a policeman.  Koemlim is requesting a loan in order to fill in the land around of her house.

loans.use: To fill in the land around of her house.

loans.name: Mubina

texts.ru: Мубина трудолюбивая и умная девушка. Ей 20 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Она успешно окончила среднюю школу и поступила в Политехнический Институт Технического Университета Таджикистана. Она учится на 1 курсе в очное отделение. Мубина является успешной студенткой факультета Экономист-инженер. Она учится хорошо и отлично. Мубина должна оплатить за учебный договор, но ее родители не имеют денег. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mubina is a harworking and intelligent woman. She is 20 years old, unmarried, and lives with her parents. She successfully completed high school and was accepted at the Polytechnic Institute of the Tajikistan Technical University. She is a full time first year student. Mubina has become a successful student in the engineering economics department. She receives A's and B's. Mubina needs to pay the school, but her parents don't have the money. She is asking for a loan to pay for her education. She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for tuition at the university

loans.name: Inomjon

texts.ru: Иномджон умный и успешный молодой человек. Ему 18 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Иномджон в этом году успешно окончил среднюю школу. Он поступил в университет и данное время должен оплатить за учебный договор. Однако его родители не имеют денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1100 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Будущим он мечтает стать хорошим специалистом и зарабатывать деньги для благополучия семьи. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Inomjon is a smart and successful young man. He is 18 years old, unmarried, and lives with his parents. Inomjon successfully graduated from high school this year. He was accepted to university, and now needs to pay the tuition, but his parents don't have the money. He is asking for a loan of 1100 USD to pay tuition. He dreams of becoming a specialist in the future and earning money to provide for the family. He is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en: Maricel is a mother of five and lives in Calabayan, Ozamiz City, with her family.  She manages a banana farm for a living.  She has been doing this for many years and it is their main source of income. Recently, she sought a loan from GDMPC micro credit in order to cover the costs of weeding maintenance and replanting. She hopes to improve her farm in order to gain an abundant harvest for better living conditions in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en: Romeo is a 30 year-old married man from Getafe, Bohol.  He has two children, ages four and nine, respectively.  He operates a motorcycle transport services. He transports passengers from one place to another. He has been operating a motorcycle  transport services for more than five years now. His wife engages in farming and grows rice to have additional income. Romeo requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy motorcycle spare parts, and fertilizers, to help improve his business. In the future, Romeo would like expand his business to be able to set aside some of the profits to purchase a new tricycle.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts, and fertilizers

loans.name: Socheat

texts.en:
Socheat (in the photo) is 30 years old.  He has been married since 2005 and has a seven-year-old son.  Socheat is hired to sell cooked rice and food and is paid with a fee. 

He now wants to run this business by himself.  Hence he decided to apply for his first Kiva loan of $1,500 to launch his new business selling cooked rice and food.  Proceeds from the loan will be used to buy tables, chairs, spoons, forks, dishes and so on.

loans.use: To launch his new business selling cooked rice and food.

loans.name: Tagoigul

texts.ru: Тагойгул 57-летняя замужняя женщина, проживающая со своей семьей в районе Вахш Хатлонской области. У нее есть двое дочерей и один сын. Старшая дочь работает в первом микро финансовом банке, младшая дочь занимается шитьем, а сын студент. Муж Тагойгул работает мастером по ремонту домов. Сама Тагойгул в течение 15 лет работает ведущим специалистом в Управлении по занятости населения района Вахш. Одновременно вместе с дочерью она занимается дома шитьем женских платьев на заказ. Тагойгул сейчас нуждается в кредите. Она хочет оплатить за учебу сына, который окончил второй курс Технического Университета факультета энергетики. Сейчас они должны заплатить за третий курс учебы. Тагойгул просит кредит в размере 1050 долларов США. Она обещает выплачивать кредит в срок.
texts.en: Tagoigul is a 57 year old married woman living with her family in the Vakhsh district of the Khatlon region. She has two daughters and one son. Her older daughter works in the first micro-finance bank, her younger daughter is a seamstress, and her son is a student. Her husband is a house repair specialist. Tagoigul herself has worked for the last 15 years as a senior specialist in the Vakhsh District Employment Office. At the same time she also does tailoring of women's dresses from her home, with her daughter. Tagoigul now needs a loan. She wants to pay for her son's education. He has finished his second year at the Technical University in the energy department. They need to pay for the third year now. Tagoigul is asking for a 1050 USD loan. She promises to repay the loan on schedule.

loans.use: Pay her son's university tuition

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is the mother of two children and lives in Clarin, Misamis in Occidental Province. She runs a sari sari, or general store, and farms to earn a living. She also helps her husband who works in a bakery in town in order to make a living.

Marlyn is applying for a new loan of 5000 PHP through GDMPC to buy dried fish and bagoong, a type of condiment made of fermented fish or shrimp, to sell along with her regular stock. She would like to see her family’s standard of living rise in the future.

loans.use: to buy  dried fish and bagoong to sell

loans.name: Enkhtuya

texts.en:
Mrs. Enkhtuya, aged 50 years old, lives with her husband and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her husband has retired from work and receives the state pension. Her daughter has studied Chinese and is now looking for work. 

Mrs. Enkhtuya has been selling clothes at outdoor markets and usually withdraws her goods from a China border city. In 2007, she began selling jewelry as an additional income source. Now she is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to purchase jewelry in large quantities so that she can run her jewelry sales business without worrying about an inventory shortage. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who is doing everything she can to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry in large quantities.

loans.name: Menihol

texts.ru: Менихол трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 53 года. Она замужем и имеет 5 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Она является основной кормилицей в семье, так как ее муж нигде не работает и не имеет источника дохода. Она более 22 лет работает в средней школе техничкой. Полученную зарплату она использует для обеспечения семьи. Ее старшие дети работают и помогают ей по обеспечению семьи. Она должна провести мероприятие в семье, но для этого она не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для проведения мероприятия. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Menihol is a hard working woman. She is 53 years old, married, and has five grown children. She is the primary provider for the family since her husband is unemployed and has no income. She has worked for over 22 years as a janitor at a middle school. She uses her salary to pay for the family's living expenses. Her older children work and help her provide for the family. She wants to hold a family event, but does not have the money, so she is requesting a 1000 somoni loan. She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: To hold a family party

loans.name: Jennefer

texts.en:
Jennefer, her husband and her three children live on a farm in Montol, Ozamiz City. While she helps out sometimes on the farm, most of her time is spent in her sari-sari, or general store. She has run it for many years.

Jennefer recently applied for a 15,000 PHP loan in order to stock up on canned goods, noodles and sugar to sell. She plans to use any additional profits to improve her family’s general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles and sugar to sell

loans.name: Mendbayar

texts.en: Mrs. Mendbayar, 33 years old, lives with her husband and son in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been running her barbershop for three years and accumulated a vast amount of experience. Her husband makes Mongolian traditional dresses for special occasions. Next year her daughter will enroll in university. She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to purchase cattle from the countryside at lower prices. After bringing cattle to Ulaanbaatar, she wants to sell them to vendors at higher prices so as to generate income from the price difference. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Merie Ann

texts.en:
Merie Ann, 29, is single and from Bañadero, Ozamis City. For more than ten years she has farmed rice to earn a living. She makes about 15,000 PHP a month.

Merie Ann has been a member of GDMPC since 2008. She is applying for a new loan of PHP 50,000 to cover the costs of land preparation, fertilizer and seedlings. In the future, Merie Ann wants to expand her farm so she can harvest more rice and increase her income.

loans.use: to cover the costs of land preparation, fertilizer and seedlings

loans.name: Gulruhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсор женщина с прекрасной душой и прекрасными мыслями. Она является хранительницей очага своего дома. Гулрухсор замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 не совершеннолетних детей. Ей 41 года. Гулрухсор упорно работает с раннего утра до позднего вечера для того, чтобы обеспечить своих детей со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Она более 3 лет занимается купле продажей детской одежды на местном рынке. Она постепенно изучает тонкости бизнеса. Гулрухсор хочет увеличить доход, так как она нуждается больше денег для образования детей, а также для их питания. Она должна обновить ассортимент товара для нового сезона. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки детской одежды. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Gulruhsor is a woman with a wonderful spirit and lovely mind. She is the mainstay of her home. Gulruhsor is married and has four children. She is 41 years old. Gulruhsor works tirelessly from down to dusk to provide her children with what they need. For over three years she has been selling children's clothing at the local market. She is gradually learning all the ins and outs of the business. Gulruhson wants to increase her income, because she needs more money for her children's education, as well as food. She needs to renew her inventory for the new season. She is asking for a 2000 somoni loan to buy children's clothing. She is relying on your kindness and hopes for your compassion.

loans.use: To buy children's clothes to increase working capital

loans.name: Renante

texts.en: Renante is a married man and a father of two children and lives in Dalapang, Ozamiz City.  He manages a farm of corn and banana to make a living. He has been doing this since he got married.  Recently, he borrowed a loan from GDMPC which he joined in 2008 to buy fertilizer such as manure to replant bananas.  He hopes to gain more from an abundant harvest this cropping in order to pursue their plans to renovate their house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer such as manure to replant bananas.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is a 23-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has no child yet. She engages in seaweed farming. She grows cultured seaweed to earn a living. She has been growing seaweed for almost three years now. Due to lack of capital to continue her livelihood, Jocelyn requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy additional seaweed seedlings and pataw (a small float usually made of cork attached to a fishing line) to yield more harvest. In the future, Jocelyn would like to expand her farming business to be successful as well as to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy additional seaweed seedlings and pataw (a small float usually made of cork attached to a fishing line)

loans.name: Christian

texts.en: Christian is married with an only child and lives in Bitoon, Ozamiz City. He serves as a government employee and is operating a service based business providing motor transportation and rentals. He has been in this business for more than three years. In 2012, he became a member of GDMPC and recently borrowed a loan of 19,000 PHP to cover the costs of motor maintenance. He hopes to expand his business to provide a better future for the family.

loans.use: to cover the costs of motor maintenance

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en: Catalina is a widow and lives in Cabungaan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, with her children. She operates their farm and runs a sari sari store to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. As a member of GDMPC, she borrowed a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure and to add capital for her store. She hopes to gain more income in order to use it for their daily needs and be able to save a portion of her profit for the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure and to add capital for her store

loans.name: Maryam's Group

texts.en:
Maryam is a 43-year-old married woman, living with her family in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband owns a fish farm on partnership. In Pakistan, the rainy season has started, and due to monsoons the boundary wall of the fish farm cracked. His farm filled with rainwater and began to flow out from the fish farm. Many fish were also carried away with the water. Now he wants more fish for his fish farm, but he does not have enough money to buy fish. 

For this purpose, Maryam contacted Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband would be able to buy more fish for his fish farm. Maryam hopes that this loan will prove beneficial for her family and effect positive changes upon their lives. Her dream is to provide better facilities and higher qualifications to her children. She is very thankful to Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan.

Note: Maryam stands on the left side in the picture.

loans.use: to buy fish for fish farming

loans.name: Shamim's Group

texts.en:
Shamim is 46 years old and a vigorous married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She belongs to a poor family, and her family is passing their lives in miserable condition due to their lack of sources of income.

Her husband does work selling cloth. He purchases cloth from other cities at cheap rates and sells it to established markets of Lahore city. Her husband has been doing the same practice for eight years. Now, with the growth of his family, he wants to grow his business also.

Shamim requested a loan from Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband could buy a variety of cloth in large quantities, and through the profit she may change the present condition of her family.

She wants to see a change in the condition of her family, the education of her children, and the business of her husband. She seems happy after taking this loan and thankful to BRAC Pakistan.

Note: Shamim has identified herself by raising her hand in the picture.

loans.use: to buy a variety of cloth to sell

loans.name: Tom

texts.en:
Tom is 33 years old, married, and a father of one child aged eight years. He is a wheat farmer and has been in this business for the last seven years with a monthly income of KES 15,000. He is servicing his third loan of KES 50,000 from KADET and this will facilitate him in preparation of the farm and purchase of inputs.

He hopes to use anticipated profits to diversify in crop rearing. His future dream is to improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: prepare the land for plantation

loans.name: Yasmine

texts.en:
Yasmine is a 25-year-old single woman who has worked as a hairdresser since five years ago. Yasmine's responsibilities are very big since she is responsible for five of her family members which forces her to develop her business more and more.

Yasmine is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to buy newly released hairdressing tools and beauty cosmetics that will help in developing her business, pleasing her customers, and increasing her income.

Her house is her beauty salon because she doesn't have enough capital to open a separate one. As for her future plans, moving her business outside her house will be the first step to take.

loans.use: To buy newly released hairdressing tools and beauty cosmetics that will help in developing her business

loans.name: Gulruhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсору 46 лет. Она добросовестная и трудолюбивая женщина. Гулрухсор имеет благополучную семью. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Один из ее детей совершеннолетние, а трое не совершеннолетние. Гулрухсор является основной кормилицей в семье и поэтому она упорно трудится для того, чтобы зарабатывать деньги и обеспечить семью со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Она более 8 лет занимается купле продажей детской одежды. Она имеет большой опыт и постепенно развевает бизнес. Она имеет торговую точку на местном рынке и старается продавать красивые и качественные детские одежды. Она должна обновить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет денег. Другие бизнесмены уже обновили ассортимент своего товара, для нового сезона и если она тоже не будет обновлять ассортимент товара, то потеряет своих клиентов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки детской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulruhsor is 46 year old. She is a conscientious and hard working woman. Gulruhsor has a wonderful family. She is married and is raising four children. One of her children is an adult, while the other three are still underage. Gulruhsor is the main provider for the family and she works tirelessly to earn money and provide her family with all the necessities. She has been selling children's clothes for 8 years. She has a lot of experience and steadily develops her business. Gulruhsor has a retail stall at the local market and tries to sell beautiful and well-made children's clothes. She needs to refresh her inventory for the upcoming season but has no money. Other businesses have already updated their inventory for the new season and if Gulruhsor doesn't update the clothes she will loose her clients. She is requesting a loan of 10000 somoni to purchase children's clothes for the new season. She hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy children clothes for the new season

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses is a 31-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. For three years he has been selling clothes and also practicing farming for additional income. A good father, he has dreams of educating his children up to the university level and setting up sustainable income-generating activities for them. Like all traders in the business he is faced with a challenge of ever-changing customer preferences and inadequate capital while his dream is to own a boutique. Moses is requesting a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Same

texts.ru:
Самеъ является мастером по производству деревянных диванов, кроватей, и дверей. Он научился этому делу у своего отца, которого уже нет в живых. Самеъ 33 года. Он женатый человек и имеет четверых детей. Его жена занимается сельским хозяйством, а дети являются школьниками. Вместе с ними также живут его мать, сестра, двое младших братьев. Они всей семьей проживают в городе Турсунзаде.
Самеъ опытный мастер и у него прибыльный бизнес. Он уже более 8 лет занимается производством деревянных диванов, кроватей, и дверей. Так как у него много заказов, он нанял двух подмастерьев, которым он платит каждый месяц заработную плату. Сейчас Самеъ просит кредит для расширения производства. На сумму кредита он собирается купить лесоматериалы, клей и краски.
texts.en: Same is a master woodworker and makes wooden couches, beds and doors. He learned this trade from his father who has passed away. Same is 33 years old, married and has four children. His wife is a farmer, and his children are still in school. They live together with Same's mother, his sister and two younger brothers. The entier family lives in Tursun-zoda. Same is an experienced craftsman and has a lucrative business. For the last eight years he has been making wooden couches, beds and doors. As he gets a lot of orders, Same hired two assistants, whom he pays a monthly salary. Now Same is requesting a loan to expand his business. He will use the loan to purchase lumber, glue and paint.

loans.use: to purchase lumber, glue and paint in order to expand his business

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Нилуфар женщина с высшим образованием. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж работает бухгалтером в средней школе. Нилуфар опытный педагог. Она более 23 года работает в средней школе. Данное время она работает заместителем директора. Она хочет, чтобы ее дети тоже были образованными людьми. Ее сын в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в университет. Нилуфар должна оплатить за учебный договор своего сына, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для оплаты учебного договора своего сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nilufar is a woman with a college degree. She is married and is raising three children. He husband works as an accountant at the local school. Nilufar herself is an experienced educator who has worked in the school for 23 years. Currently she works as the associate director. She wants her children to grow up as educated people. Nilfur's son has finished high school this year and was accepted to the university. Nilufar needs to pay his tuition but has no savings. She is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to pay her son's tuition. She hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s university education

loans.name: Kenja

texts.ru: Кенча 36 лет. Он дехканин, проживающий в городе Турсунзаде. У него жена и трое детей. Сыну 8 лет, старшей дочери 5 лет и младшей дочери 3 года. Кенча последние 8 лет занимается растениеводством. Одновременно он работает мастером, предоставляющим услуги по ремонту домов. Недавно Кенча расширил свою земледельческую деятельность и приобрел 80 соток земельного участка. На этой земле он собирается выращивать зерновую культуру, а именно рис. С этой целью Кенча обратился за кредитом. На половину суммы кредита он хочет приобрести семена риса, а остальную часть отдать в качестве оплаты за труд наемных рабочих. Кенча ждет вашей поддержки.
texts.en: Kenja is 36 years old. He is a small-scale farmer who lives in Tursun-zoda. He has a wife and three children. His son is 8 years old, his eldest daughter is 5 years old and his youngest is 3. Kenja has been farming for eight years. At the same time Kenja also works as a contractor who repairs houses. Recently Kenja has expanded his farming business by purchasing 80 "sotok" (2 acres) of land. He plans to grow grains, especially rice on this land. Kenja has turned to Kiva for a loan. He plans to use half of the sum to purchase rice seeds and the other half to pay salary to farm workers. Kenja hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and pay farm workers' salary

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назира имеет высшее образование. Ей 37 лет. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она более 15 лет работает учительницей в средней школе. Она преподает русский язык и русскую литературу. Она является единственной кормилицей и надеждой своих детей. Назира вместе со своими детьми живет в доме, который имеет плохое состояние. Она должна отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесину и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможет ей улучшить условию проживания.
texts.en: Nazira has a college degree. She is 37 years old, divorced and is raising three children. For the last 15 years she has worked as a teacher at the local school. She teaches Russian language and Russian literature. She is the sole provider and hope for her children. Nazira lives with her children in a house which is in bad condition. She needs to repair her house, but has no savings. Nazira is requesting a loan of 4000 somoni to purchase building materials, like cement, lumber and such. She hopes for your kindness. This loan will help Nazira improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and wood for repairing her house

loans.name: Sadi

texts.ru:
Саъди проживает в районе Носири Хусрав. В этом районе жители в основном занимаются разведением скот. Одни для потребления а другие для торговли. Этот вид деятельности является основным источником дохода для многих жителей. Сейчас в районе Носири Хусрав очень жарко. 
Саъди 43 летний женатый мужчина. Он имеет среднее образование. Родители Саъди не смогли помочь ему поступить в ВУЗ. Саъди является отцом четверых детей. У него одна дочь и трое сыновей. Двое его сыновей учатся в школе. 
Сейчас он не работает. В семье, его жена занимается растениеводством. Саъди помогает жене, также он присматривает за скотом. У них в доме две коровы, бык и 2 телят. Сейчас скот находится на пастбище. 
Саъди берет кредит чтобы начать свою деятельность. Он хочет заняться скотоводством (купле-продажей). У него имеется опыт в этой сфере. В детстве он вместе с отцом разводил скот, водил скот на пастбище. 
Саъди намерен сначала закупить двух коров и двух телят. Также он хочет купить корм для скота. Через каждые два месяца он планирует продавать по одному крупнорогатому скоту и закупать телят, и таким образом расширять бизнес. Все его старания только для того, чтобы обеспечить семью всем необходимым, а также для того чтобы устроить детей в ВУЗ и накопить деньги для свадьбы дочери. Он много думает о будущем своей маленькой и единственной дочери, он очень переживает.
texts.en:
Sadi lives in Nosiri Khusrav region. The residents in this region mainly raise cattle for a living. Some raise cattle for sustenance, while others raise cattle for sale. Raising livestock is the main source of income for most of the residents. Currently Nosri Khusrav region is very hot. 

Sadi is a 43 year old man. He has a high school degree. His parents were not able to help him attend college. Sadi is a father of four children. He has one daughter and three sons. Two of his sons attend school. Currently, Sadi is unemployed. His wife works as a farmer. Sadi helps his wife, and also takes care of livestock. They have two cows, a bull and two calves. Currently the livestock is out on pasture.

Sadi is requesting a loan to start a new business. He wants to raise livestock for resale. Sadi has experience in raising animals. He raised cattle with his father in childhood and took them out to pasture. Sadi plans to start by purchasing two cows and two calves. He also needs to buy feed for the animals. Every two months he plans to sell the cattle and purchase new calves and so expand his business. He works hard in order to provide for his family and makes sure his children will be able to attend college. Also, he is saving money for his daughter's wedding. Sadi worries a lot about the future of his young and only daughter.

loans.use: to purchase two cows and two calves, feed and to start working and earning money for his family (provide for his family and help his children attend college)

loans.name: Azizmurod

texts.ru: Азизмурод является фермером и трактористом. Ему 45 лет. Он семьянин и имеет детей, которые учатся в школе. Азизмурод в течение 5 лет занимается растениеводством. Он имеет участок орошаемой земли, на которой выращивает огородную культуру. Азизмурод очень трудолюбивый человек и не боится трудной работы. Чтобы обеспечивать семью он еще и работает трактористом и в селе многие пользуются его услугой. В сезон посева Азизмурод уже посеял помидоры и огурцы. Теперь их нужно обработать минеральными удобрениями. А также ему необходимо отремонтировать свой трактор, чтобы он работал лучше. С этой целью Азизмурод запрашивает кредит. На половину суммы кредита он собирается приобрести минеральные удобрения, а остальную часть потратить на ремонт своего трактора.
texts.en: Azizmurod is a farmer and tractor driver. He is 45 years old, a family man and father of school age children. For the last five years he has been growing crops. Azizmurod has a plot of irrigated land where he grows vegetables. He is a very hard working man and is not afraid of challenge. To provide for his family Azizmurod also works as a tractor driver and many farmers in his village use his services. This season he already planted tomatoes and cucumbers. Now, the crops need fertilizer. Azizmurod also needs to repair his tractor so that it works better. Azizmurod is requesting the loan with this goal in mind. He will use half of the sum to purchase fertilizer and the other half to repair the tractor.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his tomato and cucumber harvest, as well as to repair his tractor

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru:
Вера живет в Мелитополе. Она торгует на местном привокзальном рынке мужской одеждой и обувью. Опыт работы – около 14 лет. Вера – замужем, у нее два взрослых сына.  
Вера планирует вложить сумму в 10 000 гривен в закупку сезонного летнего товара для развития своего бизнеса, а именно в расширения ассортимента рубашек, футболок и маек, которые всегда быстро расходятся среди покупателей в это время года.
texts.en: Vera lives in Melitopol. She sells men's clothing and shoes at the market by the railroad station. Vera has 14 years od experience. She is married and has two adult sons. Vera plans to invest 10,000 griven into purchasing seasonal summer clothes, which will help her develop her business. Specifically, she plants to expand the inventory of shirts, t-shirts and tank tops as these clothes sell out quickly during this time of year.

loans.use: to buy a variety of shirts, t-shirts and tank tops

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru: Рахим молодой человек в возрасте 24-х лет. Он недавно женился и проживает с женой у своих родителей в городе Турсунзаде. Рахим с 17 лет занимается растениеводством. Он имеет собственный участок орошаемой земли и выращивает в нем овощи и зерновую культуру. Рахим любит свое дело, ведь за счет него он обеспечивает семью. Прибыль с продажи урожая является главным источником их семейного дохода. Рахиму сейчас необходимо обработать посеянный урожай картофеля и риса. С этим намерением он просит кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений. Рахим ответственный человек и обещает выплачивать кредит в срок.
texts.en: Rahim is a young man of 24 years. He recently married and lives with his wife and his parents in Tursun-zoda. Since he was 17 years old Rahim has grown crops. He has a plot of irrigated land where he grows vegetables and grains. Rahim likes his work and is able to provide for his family. The profits from the sale of the harvest are the main source of income for the family. Rahim needs to cultivate his potato and rice fields. For this reason he is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer. Rahim is a responsible man and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his potato and rice crops

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru:
Галина уже несколько раз пользовалась кредитами КИВА. С момента выдачи предыдущего кредита Галина сталкивалась с нехваткой покупательского спроса, но благодаря тому, что предыдущая партия товара у нее была большая, Галина смогла получить скидку на оптовые цены и хорошо сэкономить на закупке товара.   
В этот раз Галина обратилась за суммой в размере 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить товар под реализацию, а именно приобрести женские трикотажные футболки и блузки. Она надеется, что за счет большего ассортимента товара у нее будет больше валового дохода, а, значит, и больше прибыль.
texts.en: Galina has used KIVA loans a few times already. Last time she took out a loan Galina faced a decrease in customer demand, but thanks to the loan she was able to purchase clothes in a large batch and she received a big discount on the whole sale price, thus saving money. This time Galina has turned for a loan of 5,000 griven to purchase clothing for resale, specifically t-shirts and blouses. She hopes that by providing a wide range of clothes she will get a higher gross income and in turn, higher profits.

loans.use: to purchase t-shirts and shirts

loans.name: Vasilyi

texts.ru:
Василий живет в небольшом городке Виноградово. Он работает таксистом. Доход у него стабильный, наемных рабочих нет, работает сам на себя. У Василия жена и двое детей.
Василию необходима сумм в 24 000 гривен для того, чтобы сделать внешнюю штукатурку дома, поштукатурив фасадные стены дома декоративной штукатуркой, которая помогает сохранять тепло в доме в холодное время года и не пропускает его.
texts.en: Vasiliy lives in the small town of Vinogradovo. He works as a taxi driver. Vasiliy has a sable income, and doesn't employ anyone, but works for himself. He has a wife and two children. Vasiliy needs a loan of 24,000 griven to refinish the stucco on the exterior of his house. The stucco is necessary to keep the heat in the house and prevent it from escaping.

loans.use: to remodel his house

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.ru:
Юрий – из Виноградово, в Западной Украине. Он – частный предприниматель, торгует продуктами питания. Свой собственный дом Юрий переделал в магазин и так начал вместе с женой свое дело. Он торгует уже больше 10 лет. Раньше занимался столярным бизнесом, теперь зрение испортилось и он стал заниматься с женой только магазином. 
Юрий обратился за финансовой помощью в размере 24 000 гривен для того, чтобы сделать ремонт в одной из жилых комнат своего дома: заменить входные двери, пошпаклевать и покрасить стены, а также поклеить плитку на пол.
texts.en: Yuriy lives in Vinogradovo, in Western Ukraine. He is a private businessman and sells groceries. Yuriy converted his house into retail space and together with his wife opened a grocery store. He has been working in retail for 10 years. In the past he also had a woodworking business, now his vision is failing so he has focused with his wife on the grocery store. Yuriy is requesting a loan of 24000 griven to perform repair to one of the living spaces in his home - he wants to replace the front doors, spackle and paint walls, and also install floor tiles.

loans.use: to remodel one of the rooms in his house

loans.name: Phaebe

texts.en:
Phaebe is a 34-year-old married woman with three children, two of whio go to school, and she currently lives in Kasese, Uganda. With a desire to provide for her family, she decided to begin selling clothes and with her the profits she has managed to pay fees for her children. 

She hopes to own a boutique despite bad debts and high rental costs. Phaebe is requesting a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 47-year-old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in bicycle spare parts for seven years and also does farming so as to earn additional income. He hopes to expand his business and to educate his children to higher levels; however, inadequate capital is his major challenge. 

Joseph intends to use the loan to buy more bicycle spare parts to sell.

loans.use: to buy more bicycle spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy gifts for devotional

loans.name: Josolina

texts.en: Josolina is a forty-year-old hardworking married woman living in Kasese, Uganda. She sells cassava flour in addition to farming to boost her income. She started the business to have a source of income and hopes to expand and diversify the business so as to increase her proceeds although lack of enough capital is a challenge. Josolina is requesting a loan to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Khalil

texts.en:
Khalil is a 36-year-old married man who has worked as a car mechanic since he was 16 years old. He is a father of three children who are enrolled in a private school, which is an increasing burden on him since his wife doesn't work. Khalil is a hard worker, and he puts a lot of effort into satisfying his family's needs.
His work is going on just fine, but it is not enough for him to buy anything he needs at anytime, that's why he is applying for his first loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua to buy furniture for his house. Khalil hopes to open a bigger workshop in the future.

loans.use: to buy necessary furniture for his house

loans.name: Night

texts.en: Night lives in Kasese, Uganda and she is a married woman with two children, both of whom go to school. She has been selling agricultural produce for five years as well as running a retail shop to earn extra income. She started the business to have a source of income and with the proceeds she has been able to pay school fees for her children. She hopes to expand her business by building a produce store. Night will use the loan to buy beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy beans to sell.

loans.name: Doviko

texts.en: Doviko is a 42-year-old married man with ten children, seven of whom go to school. He currently lives in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a teacher for thirteen years and with his meagre salary he has managed to educate his children, buy land and start building a house. He hopes to educate his children to higher levels of learning however poor working conditions coupled with low pay make this difficult. Doviko will use the loan to buy doors and windows to complete his house.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows to complete his house.

loans.name: Deogratias

texts.en: Deogratias is 56-year-old married man with six children currently living in Hoima, Uganda. For five years, he has been operating a produce business dealing in maize, beans and groundnuts with the aim of earning daily income for the smooth running of his family. He also deals in brick laying to supplement the income from produce in order to pay school fees. His dream is to develop his business into wholesale and to supply to the city markets. Deogratias is requesting a loan to hire labor and to buy more produce such as beans, groundnuts and maize to sell.

loans.use: to hire labor and buy more produce such as beans, groundnuts and maize to sell.

loans.name: Jidah

texts.en: Jidah is a 27-year-old married woman with 2 children and resides in Hoima, Uganda. For two years she has been running a general merchandise shop which she started with 300,000 UGX but now has capital of two million UGX. She also operates as a vendor in the markets to supplement her income. By working hard she has been able to educate her children with her proceeds. She has a dream of educating her children and building a permanent home for her family. Inadequate capital and price fluctuations are the biggest challenges she faces. Jidah is requesting a loan to add stock such as sugar, salt, soap and biscuits to sell.

loans.use: to add stock such as sugar, salt, soap and biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Aminata's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de  femmes très engagées  et de volonté sans faille dans le changement des conditions de vie du village via leur activité au sein du banc villageois créé un 17 mai 2011. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Aminata, (assise dans la deuxième rangée à l’extrême droite), est emprunteur vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve et prend en charge 05 enfants dont 03 filles. C’est une femme très dynamique et d’un engagement sans réserve pour le bon déroulement des activités du banc villageois. Son activité s’articule principalement de la vente de sucre, de riz et divers produits alimentaires.

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter en gros au marché central un sac de sucre à 25 000 F Cfa et 1sac de riz et le reste pour divers produits alimentaires (assaisonnement, bonbon, …). Qu’elle revendra au détail.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’apporter son soutien à ses enfants dans le cadre scolaire et chercher à améliorer les conditions de vie.
texts.en:
This group is made up of very committed women who have an unfailing desire to change the living conditions in their village through their activity within the Banc Villageois, which was set up on 17th May 2011. They all come from the same village and get on very well together. Their main activity is the running of small trading businesses.

Aminata, who is sitting on far right of the second row, is the star borrower of the group. She is a widow and has five children in her care, three of whom are girls. She is a very dynamic woman with an unreserved commitment to the smooth running of the Banc Villageois. Her business is primarily the sale of sugar, rice and other groceries.

With this loan, she is planning to buy wholesale from the central market a sack of sugar for 25,000CFCA, a sack of rice and other miscellaneous groceries (such as seasonings and candies). She will resell these products on a retail basis.

The profits she makes from her business enable her to support her children with their studies and to try and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy wholesale from the central market a sack of sugar for 25,000FCFA, a sack of rice and miscellaneous groceries such as seasonings, candies.., all of which she will sell on a retail basis.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Aminatou Kabirou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 30 femmes très engagées dans le changement des conditions de vie du village via leur activité au sein du banc villageois créé un 17 mai 2011. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et ont une bonne entente entre elles. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Aminata Kabirou (assise  à l’extrême droite dans la photo) est emprunteur vedette du groupe,  c’est une femme qui d’une bonne capacité de gestion des groupes, elle est âgée de 46 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 03 garçons. Son tourne autour de la vente de denrée alimentaire en majorité des assaisonnements, huile végétal et huile de palme qu’elle achète au marché central de la commune pour la revente au détail dans le village.

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter en gros au marché central des paquets de assaisonnements pour la revente par pièce de 25 F CFA, 03 bidons d’huile de palme à 18 000 F CFA le bidon revendu par 100 ml à 100 F CFA. 

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront en plus de l’épargner à accroître son cheptel afin de mieux assure la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 30 women who are very committed to changing living conditions in their village through their activity in the Banc Villageois that was set up on 17 May 2011. They all come from the same village and get on very well together. Their main activity is small-scale trading.

Aminata Kabirou, who is sitting on the far right of the photo, is the star borrower of the group. She is a woman who is very capable of managing groups, and she is 46 years old, married and mother to three boys. She sells groceries, mainly seasonings and vegetable and palm oil, which she
buys from the municipality's central market for resale on a retail basis in the village.

With this loan she is planning to buy wholesale from the central market packets of seasoning which she will resell for 25FCFA each, as well as three containers of palm oil for 18,000FCFA each which she will resell at 100FCFA per 100ml.

The profits from her business will enable her to save more money so that she can increase her capital and cover the costs of her children's education more easily.

loans.use: to buy wholesale from the central market packets of seasoning for resale at 25FCFA per packet, three containers of palm oil for 18,000FCFA each, which will be resold at 100FCFA per 100ml.

loans.name: Dienabou

texts.fr:
Mme Diénabou est un membre fondateur de son banc villageois, elle y joue un rôle très considérable dans la sensibilisation et la gestion des informations. C’est une femme très active, elle n’a cessé de progresser depuis l’inauguration de son banc villageois. 

Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 02 garçons et 03 filles. Elle a un réfrigérateur qui lui permet de vendre des jus à base de produits locaux tels que le pain de singe, le bissap, le gingembre, ….

 Pour la préparation elle achète par sac : le pain de singe à 3 000 F CFA, le bissap à 5 000 F CFA et le gingembre par kilo ; du sucre le sac à 20 000 F CFA et autres colorants alimentaires. Le produit fini est conditionné en sachet et en bouteille de 1 litre vendu respectivement à 50 et 500 F CFA.

Les bénéfices lui permettront dans un premier temps de prendre en charge la facture d’électricité et d’autre part à améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Diénabou is a founding member of her Banc Villageois and she plays a very significant role there in raising awareness and managing information. She is a very active woman and has made constant progress since the inauguration of her Banc Villageois.

She is married and mother to five children: two boys and three girls. She has a refrigerator which enables her to sell juices based on local products such as monkey bread, "bissap" (made from hibiscus flowers), ginger...

For the preparation of her juices she buys monkey bread at 3,000FCFA per sack, bissap at 5,000FCFA and ginger by the kilo, sugar at 20,000FCFA and other food colorings. The final product is packaged in sachets and 1 liter bottles which are sold for 50 and 500FCA respectively.

The profits enable her firstly to take care of the electricity bills and then to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy monkey bread at 3,000FCFA per sack, "bissap" for 5,000FCFA and ginger by the kilo, sugar at 20,000FCFA per sack and other food colorings.

loans.name: Mndalu

texts.en: Mndalu is a hardworking man, and he is working hard to meet the needs of his family. He runs a business selling fruits and vegetables. Here he is again to request another loan of KES 40,000 to buy tomatoes, potatoes, beans, vegetables and mangoes for sale. He appreciates the help given.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes, beans, vegetables and mangoes for sale.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is 34 years old and married with four children who are in school. He is a farmer in Nakuru, and he has applied for his second loan from KADET Ltd after successfully paying back his previous loan on time. He intends to buy a cow for dairy farming with the loan.

Samson hopes to grow his dairy-farming business by buying more dairy cows in the future. In this way, he hopes to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter lives in Naivasha and is married to Margaret. He runs a retail shop in Naivasha, which he has operated for the past eight years. He earns an average income of KES 30,000 per month. He has applied for his fourth loan from KADET Ltd to enable him to buy stock such as flour, sugar, beans and maize among other items. With the anticipated profits, Peter plans to add more stock to his shop.

Peter hopes to open a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: To buy stock such as flour, sugar, beans and maize among other items.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a married woman; she has one child who attends school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She operates a fruit and vegetable stall business, selling from her home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces stiff competition from other vegetable operators in her business.
 
With the KES 25,000, Mwanasiti wants to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits and green vegetables for resale. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits and green vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Doris Zulema

texts.es:
Doris con 21 años de edad es una joven con muchas fuerzas, muchos sueños para ella y su familia la cual está compuesta por un hijo y su compañero de hogar. Tiene 6 años de educación su pareja es constructor y agricultor ella es ama de casa y agricultora siendo sus padres los que le enseñasen a trabajar la tierra desde muy temprana edad. Ella se dedica a la venta y cultivo de yuca, café, maíz y frijol desde hace más de 4 años siendo sus clientes los diferentes compradores que llegan al mercado de la zona, vecinos y familiares. La tierra que trabajan es propia gracias a una herencia familiar por parte de sus padres la cual está ubicada a 2.5 kilómetros de distancia de su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan en ocasiones a pie y algunas veces en vestía. 

Ella ha solicitado un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL con el cual podrá comprar fertilizantes, abono, foliares pares entre otros que ayudaran a sus cultivos a estar más sanos y protegidos de plagas, bichos entre otros.

Sus metas es ser una de las mejores productoras de café entre otros de la zona atrayendo más clientes para su negocio y creciendo en variedad y calidad. Sus sueños son los de poder ahorrar para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo, un mejor estilo de vida y lograr mandarlo a la universidad para que pueda estudiar y ser profesional.
texts.en:
Doris is 21 years old. She is a young woman who has a lot of strength and a lot of dreams for herself and her family, made up of her son and the man she lives with. She has 6 years of education and her spouse works in construction and is a farmer. She is a housewife and farmer. Her parents taught her how to work the earth sine she was very young.  She has grown and sold yucca, coffee, corn and beans for more than 4 years. Her customers are different buyers who go to the area market, as well as neighbors and relatives. They own the land they work thanks to a family inheritance from her parents. It is located 2.5 kilometers from their house. Sometimes they walk there and sometimes they take transportation.  

She has asked for a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative. With it, she will be able to buy fertilizers and pesticides, among other things. There will help her crops be healthier and protected from pests, bugs and more. 

Her goal, among others, is to be one of the best coffee producers in the area, attracting more customers for her business and growing in variety and quality. Her dreams are being able to save to give her son a better quality of life and a better lifestyle, and  send him to college so he can study and have a good career.

loans.use: to buy agricultural products for her coffee crops, among other things.

loans.name: Yaoska Auxiliadora

texts.es: Yahoska, es una joven de 22 años de edad, estudiante de la carrera de Licenciatura en Derecho, gracias a la ayuda de Dios y sus padres paga sus gastos universitarios, ella tiene mucha ilusión de  culminar su profesión para ayudar a su familia y en futuro poder cursar un posgrado en Derecho. El crédito lo solicita para pagar el curso de titulación de la carrera, para poder concluir sus estudios.
texts.en: Yahoska is a 22 year old young woman. She is studying law, and thanks to God and her parents she pays for her college courses. She has a lot of dreams of practicing her profession to help her family and in the future have a post-graduate degree in law. She is asking for the loan to pay for a graduation course to get her degree.

loans.use: to pay for a graduation course

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 34 years old and married to Mary. They have two children, ages 5 and 12. Joseph has been operating a small business making metal boxes for the past seven years. He earns an average income of KES 25,000 per month from his business. He has applied for his third loan from KADET Ltd to enable him to buy more materials for his business. He intends to save the anticipated profits from his business.  

Joseph hopes to see his business grow to a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: To buy materials for making metal boxes.

loans.name: María Angel

texts.es:
María tiene 67 años de edad, es casada.
